a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in per capita CO₂ emissions and GDP, World
This measures fossil fuel and industry emissions. Land use change is not included.
Source: Maddison Project Database 2020 (Bolt and van Zanden, 2020), Global Carbon Budget (2022); Gapminder (2022); UN (2022); HYDE
Note: GDP is adjusted for inflation.
